title: "Attempting to Reconnect" - TPG issue?
body:
Hi guys,

I am going out of my mind at the moment. I recently moved house and set up a new ADSL2+ connection with TPG. While in game I keep getting this "attempting to reconnect" issue which occurs about 5 minutes into a game. This issue will last about 10 seconds until it manages to re-establish the connection – at which point I am most likely dead. This continues during the whole game, in which I could disconnect up to 5 or 6 times. – Extremely Frustrating!

I have had TPG techs come over to the house to run checks on the line etc, and they keep telling me there is no issue. I have been doing some of my own research on this, and I can see a couple of threads going back a year or so with TPG users experiencing this problem. Has it just not been fixed yet??

Out of curiosity I wanted to see what my connection was doing while the the game “attempts to reconnect” ..so I ran a ping to google.com indefinitely. I load up a game of league and soon after I get the “attempting to reconnect”. I alt tab out of the game to see what the ping is doing and it times out for the exact same time league is trying re-establish connection.

I need to determine if this is a league problem or what is going on? I am running a wired connection and am located in VIC.

Help please guys :(

PS guys -  I can play fine over my 4G phone connection I have with Optus.

replies.body: It might be TPG's DNS playing up again. Have you tried [using Google's Public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#wq5) (instructions for Mac available on that same page)? Be warned, however, it will disable some services such as data metering or proxy use.
